name: Chateau de La Barre
cleaned_text:
Bonjour Sarah,
 
Congratulations on your engagement !
We would have availability for both autumn 2026 and Spring 2027, although I tend to recommend autumn, as the weather is generally less rainy and the fall colours are magnificent. Plus the château, which would be privatized for your wedding, is warmer, since the thick walls have absorbed the warmth from the summer.
 
We don’t have a standard brochure, as each wedding is tailor made. I generally prefer to have a telephone conversation with the couple getting married, to find out more of how they envisage their wedding.
 
I can attach here a few general pictures, and give you an approximate price, obviously to be redefined according to your specific wishes.
 
For weddings, we privatize our entire château for you, for 2 full days. Including accommodation for up to 20 guests sharing rooms (we have 10 en suite double/king size rooms, 2 of which are suites with an adjoining single room, and 3 of which can also be made up with twin beds, plus one single room and a double room of lesser quality on the second floor)
The price is 12’000 € for both nights, including daily breakfast and full use of all four reception rooms, as well as our family chapel, and also including basic floral arrangements and all the tables and chairs and plates/glasses/cutlery for your wedding reception.
 
You need to add on the caterer (we have a list of 3 we highly recommend, but can also work with one of your choice if you prefer), the champagne, the wines (we can recommend a few excellently priced good vintners if you wish), the DJ/ orchestra and photographer if you wish (we can recommend these as well), extra floral arrangements, wedding cake etc. We can also arrange for rental cars (we partner with Audi), an amazing classic Daimler long for the wedding, a horse and carriage, and of course chauffeur transfers with vans or mini buses.
 
It is also possible to have a barnum in the garden, looking on to the château, (see one photo) but this comes at an extra cost of around 4’000 € if chosen.
 
For your other 40 guests, there is a hotel/motel in the next village, Saint Calais, with rooms around 100 e per night, plus another chateau with 11 rooms and yet another with 8 rooms, of higher quality (priced around 400-500 € per night), 20 minutes drive from us.
 
Let me know if I can help you with further information at this stage, or if you wish me to telephone you, do send me your telephone number and preferred time for a phone chat.
 
With best wishes,
 
Marnie

name: Domain de Vavril
cleaned_text:
Congratulations for your future wedding !
Thank you for contacting the Domaine de Vavril.

Here are some information for your wedding at the Domaine.

**The Domaine de Vavril, a concept of an exclusive stay during 3 nights and 4 days !**

The Domaine is fully dedicated to you. You can enjoy the nice atmosphere of this exclusive place.

**Rates for your wedding at the Domaine** **in 2027 **:
- **The reception halls and all the outdoor spaces, during 3 nights and 4 days** : 7 500€_ _(June to september) / 5 700€ (May and october) / 4 500€ (April) / 3 900€ (January to march, november and december)
_- The fully equipped reception room, which can accommodate up to 150 guests for a seated dinner (or 120 with dancefloor), with no time limit_
_- The room of the old wine press and the voulted cave_
_- The terrace with vineyards view with its elegant pellet patio heaters_
_- Outdoor spaces and terraces, perfect for a symbolic ceremony or an open-air cocktail_
_- The heated swimming pool (depending on the season)_
_- Cleaning included_
_- Heating included_
- **  Accommodation on several buildings, for 41 guests, during 3 nights** : 12 300€ (June to september - About 100€/pers/night) / 10 100€ (May and october - About 82€/pers/nigh) / 7 400 € (April - About 60€/pers/night) / 5 900€ (January to march, november and december - About 48€/pers/night)
_- The Master's Residence, which combines refinement, charm and comfort, with its magnificent suite of the bride and groom and its other family suites. It can accomodate up to 20 people (9 rooms, including 5 double rooms)_
_- The Vineyard Apartment, ideal for your witnesses, friends or for a family. It can accomodate 6 people_
_- The two harvest cottages, which can accomodate 15 people_
_- Linen and towels included_
_- Cleaning included_
_- City tax included_
_- Heating included_

For your stay, you have the choice between an arrival on Thursday at 14h and a departure on Sunday at 16h, or an arrival on Friday at 14h and a departure on Monday at 16h.

For the catering, you must choose one of [our carterers](https://vavril.fr/en/weddings/#traiteurs) : <https://vavril.fr/en/weddings/#traiteurs>

We can also recommend trusted wedding planners (english spoken) who know the Domaine inside out, or simply advise you on reliable service providers if you wish to organise your wedding yourself.

**The "little extra" of the Domaine de Vavril !**
- Our Organization service offers you 2 hours of personalized advice, to help you in organizing your wedding and to guide you in your choice of service providers.
- Free wine tasting, to discover the wines of the Domaine, on request and according to availability of our winegrower.

Visit our website www.vavril.fr, you will discover the history of the Domaine and our photo gallery.
Here is our [booking calendar](https://vavril.fr/en/availability-calendar/) if you want to check our availabilities : if you are interested in one of these dates do not hesitate to contact us.

Visit also our [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Domaine-de-Vavril/131169700278948), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/domainedevavril/) & [Pinterest](https://fr.pinterest.com/domainedevavril/) pages for more wedding ideas !

I hope I have answered a lot of your questions.
Do not hesitate to contact me for further information.

Have a lovely day.
Kind regards,

name: Chateau de la Barbeliniere
cleaned_text:
Dear,

We would be delighted to welcome you for your wedding.
We can confirm availability in October 2026 or summer 2027.
We are offering a price of €8,500.00 for 2026 and €8,900.00 for 2027, which includes:
- The Le Pavillon room located at the rear of the Château, offering a panoramic view of the old building.
- The Château's six ‘Prestige’ rooms and Junior Suites, which can accommodate around twenty guests.
- A secluded location with bucolic surroundings.
The package includes:
  
- The fully equipped 700m² Le Pavillon reception room, with sound system and lighting, until 5pm on Sunday
- Use of the kitchens by our team or your caterer
- Provision of tables and chairs for up to 300 people (cocktail capacity: 450 people - seated meal: 250 people)
- Accommodation at the Château for the night from Saturday to Sunday until 12 noon (with the option of renting the outbuildings for additional beds)
- The party can continue until 4 a.m.
- The room is available on Friday afternoon if you wish to set up your decorations and deliver anything else you need to ensure your wedding runs smoothly. 
- There is a car park with space for around 100 cars.
In addition, we can provide catering services for your reception, meal or brunch.

We invite you to visit our estate and Le Pavillon hall to get a feel for the venue.

We look forward to your visit and wish you a pleasant day.

Kind regards,

name: Chateau Lagut
cleaned_text:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for your email and your interest in our venue.

Please find below some information about our venue www.chateaulagut.com which is situated in the beautiful Dordogne in the South west of France.

Chateau Lagut is more than just a wedding venue. You will have the whole venue for your exclusive use As if it would be your home, you stay on the venue and you organize your wedding accordig to YOUR idea. You accommodate yourself and your guests for several days in the château and gîtes during your wedding week-end. What a thrilled to prepare the wedding together! And what a joy to extend the party with your guests! 46 people can stay in the gîtes and château. The price for a weekend (Friday-Sunday) in Oktober 2026, In April, May 2027 is €9.500. VAT is included in the price and 46 people can stay in the gîtes and château and the price is including sheets, towels and cleaning for the gîtes and château. It’s possible to stay more days if you want (I can give you a price for that if I have more details from you). For a wedding during the week (Monday-Thursday) the price is €8500 in Oktober, April and May. We don’t have availability anymore in September 2026.

We also have 9 clamping tents with comfortable beds and in the tents can stay 32 people in total
The price for the glamping tents is €27 a person per night (including sheets and towels).In total (gîtes, château and tents) 78 people can stay at our property, but there are several hotels and b&b’s in the neighborhood for your other guests to stay or we offer the possibility that they bring their own tent and can stay at the property.

For a small wedding, it can take place in the castle and the different rooms, each with its own atmosphere and own charm. For larger groups, the beautiful banquet hall is perfect. The natural stone walls and the wood-beamed ceiling give this room a lot of charm and can then be decorated entirely to your own taste. With an area of 300 m2 it is suitable for a maximum of 200 guests. The professional kitchen is fully equipped and can be used by the caterer of your choice, so you can enjoy a culinary (wedding) dinner in a unique location. We don’t charge corkage. The natural beauty of our wine cellars can be a perfect place for the reception. The atmosphere is one of unique, laid-back elegance providing for an intimate, down-to-earth experience. We do have round tables for 120 persons and chairs that you can use for free.

We have bbq’s and a wonderful bread oven in which you can make delicious pizzas.

We can accomodate 200 people (inside and outside) for the ceremony and you are free to choose the place on the venue where you prefer to do it (we have lots of wonderful spots to organize this). Also we have a very nice little chapel at the venue that can be used for the ceremony. We don’t charge anything for the ceremony.

Wedding preparations take lot of time and D-Day always goes too fast. Take the time to share and extend those precious moments with your loved ones. Take pleasure in offering them not only a beautiful ceremony and party, but a truly relaxing stay, where everyone you love will bound deeper together.

The extra brings you is the conviviality of a true family castle, warm and alive. All your guests will feel this unique atmosphere you will have created. Your wedding will be elegant, but most of all it will be a moment of shared happiness where all your guests will feel at home. Let them belong to YOUR story.
Rediscover the taste of simple pleasures: have breakfast all together, prepare for the ceremony in your room with your friends a glass of champagne in hand, lounge by the pool the day after, take a nap under the trees in the park while your grandmothers chat in the living room ...

You organize your wedding at your idea and with no time limit (so you can continue the party until the early hours in the morning), no corkage fees…just as it would be at home and we guarantee your personal advice and support to assist you in organizing your wedding and add to our expertise and hospitality to it. We also have a wedding planner that can organize everything you would like for you.

On our venue you can really find every possible facility to have a pleasant stay. There is a big heated swimming pool that is operational all year, a tennis court, a petanque court, a trampoline for young and old, a sauna and jacuzzi to really relax and enjoy the beautiful starry sky, a treehouse, table tennis and lots more.

Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is also available on site.

The natural beauty of the place and the tranquillity that prevails gives a unique and rare atmosphere to share special moments with your loved one. Enjoy a stunning sunset with panoramic views over the surrounding countryside; Everything is in place to make your wedding that much more special.

We will be very happy to organize this special event with you. Guided by your vision and your expectation, inspired by the extraordinary beauty of France, we are passionate and devoted to creating your personal celebration with all the romantic touches and cultural influences that you desire.

The airport from Limoges and Bergerac are about 1 hour driving and the airport from Bordeaux 1h30.

Please let me know, if you want some more information or if you want a virtual visit by Face Time, WhatsApp or coming over to visit the venue.

Kind regards,

Wendy

cleaned_text:

name: Chateau de Bouthonvilliers
cleaned_text:
For weddings at the estate, we offer a dedicated event package that includes the exclusive rental of the entire property for a minimum stay of 3 nights (7 nights in July/August). This package covers on-site accommodation for your guests, as well as access to all event spaces, furniture, and services, as outlined below:
Accommodation up to 35 guests :
Your guests will be accommodated on-site in the château and its outbuildings:
\- In the château : 11 bedrooms and 6 bathrooms (maximum 15 people, due to fire safety regulations)
\- In the cottage (outbuilding): 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (up to 12 guests)
\- In the loft (outbuilding) : 1 bedroom and a dormitory with 6 beds (8 guests total)
Each house includes its own kitchen and living room.
(A detailed floor plan of the rooms is attached.)

Event up to 40 guests maximum:
Ceremony :
You are welcome to hold your wedding ceremony anywhere in the park or in the small on-site chapel.
Wedding dinner Options:
In good weather: Outdoors in the park, using our long wooden tables and chairs (up to 40 people)
In case of bad weather :
 \- Indoors at the château: up to 32 people seated in one room (4 round tables in the Yellow Living Room), or 40 people across adjoining rooms
 \- In the newly renovated Garden House: up to 40 people seated
Dancing Party:
The party can take place outdoors in the park or indoors on the stone floor room inside the château.
All furniture, including tables, chairs, and tablecloths, is provided for the ceremony, seated dinner, and cocktail hour.

Catering :
We offer catering services for your stay and the wedding day for up to 40 guests.
(Sample 2025 new menus attached)
You are also welcome to use the kitchens in each house if you prefer to prepare your own meals during your stay.

Costs :
The event rental package includes:
\* Exclusive use of the entire estate from Day 1 (5:00 PM) to the final day (10:00 AM)
\* On-site accommodation for up to 35 guests in the château and outbuildings
\* Use of reception spaces and setup of all event furniture (tables, chairs, tablecloths) for one event day with up to 40 guests
\* Use of the chapel for the ceremony 
\* Setup of outdoor lighting (string lights and spotlights) for the event

Package Price for 3 Nights: €10,900
Additional nights: €2,000 per night
Additional costs:
\* End-of-stay cleaning: €550
\* House linen: €10 per person
\* Tourist tax: €0.60 per adult per night

Optional Services :
We can also provide the following if needed:
\* Sound and lighting system for the dance party: €250
\* Prestige dinnerware set for the wedding dinner (vintage porcelain plates, silver cutlery, luxury glasses): €10 per person

We can share a list of recommended vendors (florist, photographer, wedding planner, celebrant, musicians, etc.), but you're welcome to use your own suppliers.

If you wish to book your dates, we will send you the rental agreement along with our bank details for the 50% deposit to confirm your reservation. The remaining balance will be due no later than 30 days before your arrival.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out with any further questions.

name: Chateau de Saint-Girons
cleaned_text:
Hello Sarah,
 
At Château de Saint-Girons, we give you our domain and leave you free choice of providers (caterer, DJ, photographer, equipment rental, etc.).

Our domain includes:

\- Northside, the entrance and the parking lots;

\- Southside, the reception areas including the South terrace of the house, the swimming pool lawn where takes place generally the cocktail party, our “Préau” which is ideal for the dinner and the party up to 130 people maximum (beyond, the dinner is necessarily outdoor - installation of a tent possible at your expenses), a French garden which can serve for photos, child area with swings and trampoline and, to finish, a space for outdoor ceremonies (option with arrival at 5 pm instead of 6 pm - 250 euros).
 
We have restrooms (2 toilets, 2 urinals and 4 sinks), a covered area for the caterer with available connections (refrigerated truck, steam rooms, etc.), and a room to make children sleep if needed (15 m ², option - 250 euros).

We can also suggest you come back the next day for a brunch (option - 1 000 euro – noon to 6 pm, swimming pool available under surveillance at your expense - approximately 200 euros).

The furniture is generally managed by the caterer (otherwise, we know renters very well which also proposes dance floors), our furniture is more for decoration.
 
For a wedding reception a Saturday - 6pm to 4 am in the morning on Sundays - for 60 people, our price will be 5 000 euros (September 2026) / 4 500 euros (October 2026) / 5 000 euros (May 2027). Cocktail will be outside, dinner outside and party will be under our Pavilion (we no longer accept outside parties). In case of bad weather, you could also do the cocktail under the pavilion but I usually advise on finding a last minute small tent to seperate the cocktail from dinner / party.

We offer 4 guest rooms on-site (2 rooms and 2 suites - rates between 240 euros and 310 euros/ room/ night with 2 breakfasts included in high season).As part of the wedding receptions, in addition to Saturday, Friday will be half price allowing you to enjoy your rooms from the morning for the preparations (4 rooms on Saturday = 1 070 euros - 4 rooms on Friday & Saturday = 1 605 euros in high season).

I remain at your disposal for further information.

Kind Regards,
---
**Clément**

name: Chateau de Tourreau
cleaned_text:
I’m Fabien Castillo, event coordinator of Château de Tourreau, thank you for your interest in the château regarding this unforgettable event.

Wedding rental periods are on a minimum of 4 Days / 3 Nights for week-ends event, you have included the accommodations for 29 persons on site : 15 guests in main Château and 14 guests in the « Guest-House » situated 20 meters from the château. 
Our 16 en-suites bedrooms have A/C & Wifi trough a fiber connection, a daily bedrooms cleaning is done by our housemaids staff.
Of course the property is completely privatized during the rental period , and plenty of B&B and good hotels are available at less than 30 minutes by car for your non resident guests.

You will have access at the 16 acres of the property during your stay : 
Infinity Swimming Pool ( 25m X 10m ) / Inside Squash / Fitness area / Tennis court / Basketball court / Volley ball court / Vegetable Garden / Playground for Kids / Parking ( Helipad )

It’s possible to do during the rental period a welcome/rehearsal dinner on site also a brunch by the pool without additional extra fees. 

For the wedding day, the property have plenty of possibilities for the different steps of the night.

Generally your guests arrive from the main gate, at the north façade a welcome cocktail could be performed, then your guests can go trough inside the château to access at the « French garden Area ». The ceremony can take place inside our 1614 consecrated chapelle ( up to 70 guests ) or near the fountain in the south park or at the south façade; after the ceremony the main cocktail could take place around the infinity swimming pool, and the dinner and party part near the château at the French garden area ( south façade ). 

All the event must take place outside the building and in case of bad weather, a marquee must be prepared in « plan B ».
The music must be stopped at 03 AM, sound limitation 90 Décibels (technician on site for control). ( midweek event : end of music 2AM ) 
Live Bands allow the wedding night but sonorisation and technical supervision mandatory by : « Aucop » company. ( Electronic Battery ) 


We also have the autorisation to perform Fireworks and we receive event up to 150 pax. ( firework upon approval depending calendar ).

Affiliated caterers only : Helen Traiteur / Frederic Bernard / L’éveil des Papilles / Brunch me Up.

Additionally Include in the rental :

_Wedding night venue supervision ( Technical  ) _
_Only DJ - the Wedding Dancing sound system include ( Speakers - Sound engineer )_
_Toilet waiter service ( Rehearsal / Wedding / Brunch )_
_Brunch lifeguard supervision _
_-_
_2X Continental Buffet Breakfast ( 29x Resident Guests )_
_Wedding lunch take-away buffet ( 29x Resident Guests )_


You can find some previous weddings pictures through this link : [https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/7lre5kxy2tgz745jg6y8z/h?dl=0&rlkey=l723ukmconpg0ca1jbyd90t66](https://kor01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dropbox.com%2Fscl%2Ffo%2F7lre5kxy2tgz745jg6y8z%2Fh%3Fdl%3D0%26rlkey%3Dl723ukmconpg0ca1jbyd90t66&data=05%7C02%7C%7C94f1c2bc3078417a9e4808ddec5da5bd%7C84df9e7fe9f640afb435aaaaaaaaaaaa%7C1%7C0%7C638926609162567043%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=jNTe3JVIJjza9yXxDpSrGiBx55ektItUJIiGcj8msQ8%3D&reserved=0) 

\-
One of our May 2023 wedding got featured on  « Style Me Pretty » 
[https://bit.ly/47Aj7rr](https://kor01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbit.ly%2F47Aj7rr&data=05%7C02%7C%7C94f1c2bc3078417a9e4808ddec5da5bd%7C84df9e7fe9f640afb435aaaaaaaaaaaa%7C1%7C0%7C638926609162613983%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=zSfaTqru3lEI%2BnxSSx5V0xMjroIwzyzy4fwyA8ZIYPY%3D&reserved=0)
\-

**\*Rental prices & availabilities for 2027  : **

April : 55,000 € ( friday/monday )
May : **30/03 - **65,000 €** //  07/10 - **75,000 € **// 14/17 -** 85,000 €  // **21/24 -** 95,000 €** // 28/31** - 115.000 € 
June : ** **135,000 € ( friday/monday )
July & August : 160,000 € ( Thursday/monday ) // Midweek : 120,000 € _(Monday to Friday)   ( **Only 1 event per month** ) _
September : **03/06 & 10/13** - 120.000 € // **17/20 & 24/27** - 95.000 € ( friday/monday )
October : 70,000 € ( friday/monday )
\-
\-
_Additional rental day possible depending periods._
\-
Rest of the year on request.
\-
_Midweek rental possibility on request _


Prices are for the venue privatization only and don't include : event catering / florist / furniture rental / technical / etc… 

A wedding planner must be in charge of total co-organisation, if needed we’re able to share with you few contacts. 
\*Prices quoted are available for a period of 1 Month

Visit of the property or video-call tour is possible on appointment only.

Waiting to read you, don’t hesitate to ask me any questions.

name: No.3 The Château
cleaned_text:
All our weddings at No3 are bespoke and so individually planned, designed and co ordinated to each couple, therefore we do not offer ’set prices’ for everything except the venue. 
It really does depend what you want for your wedding but I can give you a base line idea of costs. It is all planned and designed for you with our wedding planner so no need to worry about the organisation in any way. 

> Have you seen our brochure on our website? It gives all the details of how our weddings work at No3. 

   €20,000 Venue inclusive of accommodation in the entire chateau for 12 people for 3 nights. 
    Including tables and chairs which would be around €2,000
    Full fairy light canopy over the outdoor dining included (install price for this would be around €4,000)
    NO CORKAGE CHARGES, which means you can buy your wine, champagne and beer through a local supplier at very reasonable cost. 
    This venue price including all of the above is inclusive of VAT. It is the price for up to 100 guests. €150PP extra for over 100 guests.   
> 
> 
> Then you would have the following to consider based on 70 guests and a relative cost for 100 guests. These prices are a guide only from the suppliers, based on weddings this year.
> 
> **Wedding day**
> 
> **Catering**
> 
> **€165pp**, this includes a pre ceremony drink, drinks reception drinks, canapes, 3 course dinner, wine with dinner, evening party bar, evening snack, staff, basic tableware. Total for 70 guests= **€11,550**
> 
> **\* this is a very standard fee, it could be reduced if you removed formality and the need for 3 courses.**
> 
> **Rentals**
> 
> This is not needed at No3 as this is included in the rental price but as set up is not included, it would be best to assume around €300-400 for a set up and takedown fee. Total **€300-400**
> 
> **Photography**
> 
> This can range from €2000-10,000 with a fair average being around **€4000**
> 
> **Videography**
> 
> Same as above and a little more expensive but on average **€4000**
> 
> **Celebrant **
> 
> **€1000 but quite often our couples like to ask a close family member or friend. **
> 
> **Florals and props**
> 
> Average floral spend is **€4000** which would give a decent amount for 70 guests. You might want more or less florals and props.
> 
> **DJ**
> 
> A DJ for the full day will be around **€2000**
> 
> **Band**
> 
> A very average wedding band will cost around **€4000 **some including equipment and others not, if it is not including equipment add another €1000 to this cost.
> 
> 
> **Hair and makeup**
> 
> 1 bride plus 4 bridesmaids, hair and makeup would cost around **€1000-€1500**
> 
> **Transport **
> 
> **€700** per 55 seater bus per return journey per day. This would bring all your guests to and from the nearby town of Cognac (15 minutes) where the majority would be staying. 
> 
> **Pre wedding event**
> 
> This can cost very little, Luciole's allow them to hire it out on a minimum spend of €2000 but the guests pay for this, if they do not reach if the clients pay the difference. A rooftop will cost around €5000 with some drinks and food. Bar Lys is around €3000 inclusive of some drinks and snack boards
> 
> **Post wedding event**
> 
> A post wedding BBQ with drinks will cost somewhere around **€60pp**
> 
> **Planner**
> 
> **€6,000 minimum/approx.**
> 
> **Insurance-mandatory**
> 
> **€500 aprox**
> 
> A grand total for No3 inclusive of:
> 
> Venue- €20,000
> Planner- €6000
> Catering x 70 guests- €11,500
> Alcohol all day-included above
> Rental items(crockery & tableware etc)-included but €400 to add for set up
> Florals- €2500(minimum)
> Entertainment (DJ)- €2000
> Photographer- €4000
> Transport- €700
> Insurance- €500
> Hair & makeup- €1500
> Celebrant- €1000
> 
> **70 guests = £42,000 (€50,000)** (this is not including a pre or post wedding event & it is a DJ not a band, plus the floral spend is €2500) and no videographer. This also does not include rings, suits, dresses, stationary.
> 
> **100** guests based on the above=**£49,000 (€58,000) **-higher minimum floral spend & more transport required
